item.description:
I'd like to thank one of our members, Megan, for suggesting this restaraunt.

It gets rave reviews for the atmosphere, food and service. I figured it's been a while since this group has been to a Japanese restaraunt.

What is Hibachi? Some Japanese restaraunts have the grills set at the table, where the chef will prepare, cook, and keep their customers entertained as they make their dinners right in front of them. It is dinner and a show all in one. For those who do not want anything on the Hibachi menu, there are other selections from the regular menu to choose from.

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Chikurin Japanese Restaurant: Hibachi anyone?
